abort.unsupported_firmware: The device is using an unsupported firmware version.

error.auth_not_supported: Shelly devices requiring authentication are not currently supported.

confirm_discovery.description:
Do you want to set up the {model} at {host}?

Before set up, the battery-powered device must be woken up by pressing the button on the device.

user.description: Before set up, the battery-powered device must be woken up by pressing the button on the device.
